name: Char-Ra
description:
Back in 2152 when humanity screwed the oceans and made them wave less, some brilliant guy said:

Hey, I'm pretty sure we can construct roads on the ocean now.

And then they constructed a road between Africa, Europe and the Americas. But there were a Intersection between the roads and they wanted to do some fun stuff, so they made the BTT™ and named the whole thing the Watersection™.

Final Notes:

Developing of the game is on hold because I don't have a lot of free time to develop the game. But please state your ideas, I would love to add some more things when I have time, like in summer.

Made By:
  • Amirhossein Poolad: Everything done in the engine.
  • Kasra Mazdab: The artist.
  • Mike Judge: Provided additional Artwork. https://github.com/ephtracy/voxel-model

"Chahar Rah چهار راه ", usually pronounced like Char(like in charcoal) Ra(like bra without the B) means a four way junction in Farsi. Char-Ra is the same word.
